rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a foyer leading into the central courtyard. Vastu-aligned, ensuring a positive flow of energy.
An open-plan living area combined with an eco-friendly kitchen utilizing natural light and ventilation. Features include large windows for cross ventilation and energy-efficient lighting.
A spacious bedroom located in the north-east corner following Vastu principles for calmness. Equipped with eco-friendly insulation and energy-efficient windows.
A compact bathroom adjacent to the bedroom, designed with sustainable materials and water-saving fixtures.

openings.description: Energy-efficient front door with natural wood finish.
Door to the central courtyard, ensuring seamless indoor-outdoor flow.
Large windows providing natural light and cross ventilation in the living-kitchen area.

rooms.description: A loft space serving as additional storage or recreational room, designed for flexibility.
An eco-friendly roof garden providing outdoor relaxation and improved insulation, in line with Vastu recommendations for harmony with nature.

openings.description: A central staircase designed to ensure safe and efficient circulation between floors, incorporating energy-efficient lighting.
Door leading from the first floor interior to the green roof deck.
